Question: Whose main research area is extragalactic astronomy and currently leading "The Herschel Lensing Survey" ??

title: egami's biography
egami's articles
sentences: Broadly speaking, my research program involves the cross-disciplinary integration of comparative psychology, ethology, sociobiology, and behavioral ecology, genetics, and development in human and nonhuman animals.

More specifically, my major substantive focus has been the applications in these areas of the integrative theoretical framework provided by evolutionary life history theory, including the utilization of psychometric methods for describing the latent hierarchical structure of life history strategy.
